properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 11:51AM EST until February 14 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Grand Rapids MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4
inches by Friday morning.

* WHERE...Mason, Oceana and Muskegon counties.

* WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact both the commute this evening and again
Friday morning.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow bands will push in off Lake Michigan
this evening and tonight with some occasionally heavy snow. With
cold temperatures in the single digits and teens travel will be
impacted by icy roads.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST FRIDAY
